Ingredients.2: 2 cups mayonnaise, or more to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook elbow macaroni in boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water.

Directions.2: Combine macaroni, mayonnaise, milk, and carrot in a large bowl; mix until macaroni is well coated. Add more mayonnaise for a wetter consistency. Season with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or up to overnight.
